about_the_game:
Coming from the lands far to the north, the Gunwitch is a masterful witch who can wield guns and crossbows and unleash devastating curses! Using four distinct curses instead of towers, the Gunwitch is able to adapt to any combat situation. If a kit full of variety is what you seek, the Gunwitch is the hero for the job!

Discover new ways to cause mayhem on Etheria with the following curses:

- [b]Icy Needle[/b] Shoot a powerful piercing projectile that slows down all enemies it damages.

- [b]Vroom Broom[/b] Use a powerful aura that increases your movement speed while healing allies on its range.

- [b]Two for the Price of One[/b] While consuming your mana, deal extra damage on enemies you hit.

- [b]Witch’s Curse[/b] Shoot a single target projectile that makes the hit enemy take more damage for 10 seconds.

Or using these powerful abilities:

- [b]Broom Nado[/b] Summon a swarm of brooms that goes forward in an area, dealing damage each second to all enemies inside

- [b]Blunder Broom Buster[/b] Fires a short-ranged spread of nets, dealing generic damage and snaring enemies in place

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2GB
  • Video Card: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2GB
  • Video Card: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 512 MB video memory
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional:
